black_cards.text: The lathe accident turned their body into _______ while the machine kept _______.
The paramedics found _______ still twitching in the machinery.
The pressure valve explosion embedded _______ into _______.
They had to identify the victim by _______ because _______.
The factory floor drain clogged with _______, _______, and _______.
What's that red mist coming from the industrial fan?
The hydraulic press malfunction left _______ fused into _______.
The coroner's preliminary report simply reads: '_______.'
The acid vat accident dissolved everything except _______.
They found _______ still clutching _______ hours after the incident.
The conveyor belt kept running until _______ jammed the _______.
The new employee's screams were drowned out by _______.
The forklift pinned them between _______ and _______.
The emergency stop button was just out of reach of _______.
The industrial freezer door trapped _______ with _______.
What's that rhythmic thumping sound from the compactor?
The worker's compensation claim included photos of _______.
The safety harness failed at _______ feet above _______.
The machine guard was removed to increase _______.
The lockout/tagout procedure was ignored because of _______ and _______.

white_cards.text: A loose necktie caught in rotating machinery
Fingers scattered across the assembly line
A wedding ring fused into melted flesh
Bone fragments in the gearbox
A severed hand still gripping the controls
High-pressure hydraulic fluid injection wounds
Scalp and hair tangled in the drill press
A crushed ribcage still trying to breathe
Skin peeled off by the conveyor belt
A face pressed flat against hot metal
The sound of bones being pulverized
A torso bisected by steel cable
Limbs twisted into impossible angles
A skull crushed like an empty eggshell
The wet thud of falling from six stories
Steam burns that stripped away all the skin
A spinal cord severed at the neck
Intestines caught in the drive shaft
Lungs filled with caustic chemicals
An eyeball impaled on a metal shard
The distinct crack of a skull meeting concrete
A body compressed into a two-inch gap
Arterial spray painting the ceiling
Teeth embedded in the safety guard
A tongue bitten clean through
Molten metal flowing into steel-toed boots
The slow crush of a mechanical press
A ribcage split open by a forklift tine
Fingers frozen to industrial refrigerant pipes
A jaw shattered by flying debris
The gurgling sound of drowning in chemicals
A body folded backwards over machinery
Flesh stripped to bone by an abrasive belt
The pop of a shoulder being dislocated
A face dissolved by industrial acid
The crunch of bones in the compactor
A hand reduced to red pulp
The smell of burning hair and flesh
A foot crushed into paste
The last gasp of a collapsed lung
A heartbeat slowly fading to nothing
Blood pooling around safety equipment
A spine snapped like a dry twig
The sound of screaming suddenly stopping
Fingernails torn out by the roots
A body turned inside out by machinery
The wet slap of viscera hitting concrete
A throat filled with metal shavings
Skin grafts that will never take
The moment rigor mortis sets in
A death rattle echoing through the factory
The sizzle of flesh on hot steel
A body cavity filled with shrapnel
The exact moment of brain death
A nervous system's final misfire
The last twitch of severed muscles
A timecard punched for the last time
The sound of bones being powdered
A workplace fatality statistic
An OSHA violation written in blood
